FOWF.Title: Fog-of-War Fixer
FOWF.Description:
A GM-helper for managing party mapping, vision, and fog-of-war:
  • Synchronize everybody's fog-of-war/explored map with a single token
  • Reveal a section of the map before being explored
  • Reset a section of the map inadvertently shown
FOWF.BUTTON.SynchronizeMapAndFog: Synchronize all explored portions of the map with all players
